text: On 14 August 2022, a fire happened at the Abu Sefein Church, a Coptic church in Giza, Egypt. It happened during Sunday worship services when nearly 5,000 worshippers were at the church. Forty-one people were killed, including at least eighteen children. 14 others were injured. ==References== Category:2022 disasters in Africa Category:2022 fires Category:2020s in Egypt Category:August 2022 events Church fire
title: Giza church fire
